name: eggs for you
description:
an egg game about an egg man giving eggs to the eggless.

eggs are hard work. remember to take breaks!

---

note: web version requires sweet and delicious third-party cookies. if you are without cookies, please download the game!

---

story, coding, lovingly drawn egg (and doorframe): littlerat

SFX: Pocket Sound

special thanks to npckc!

---

egg game is free. for $2 you can also have a DIY double-sided egg card! 

print a message from eggbert himself, or pass on your own egg message to your egg friends. 

---

made in four days for O2A2 2022. just under 1000 words.

wordcount calculation - 979 words in dialogue according to Lint
- "KNOCK KNOCK"
- "NEXT" button
- "HOME" button
- "THE ENDGG"
- "options" (menu name, changed from "preferences")
- "today's log" (menu name, changed from "history")
- "credits" (menu name, changed from "about")
- the numerals "2" through "6,"  appearing up to once each
